overview: Gurpreet Singh is the Vice-President of Product Development and Management at Ekartha Inc. He is one of the visionaries behind the Alice SaaS(Software as a Service) platform. At Ekartha he leads the development, and product management, of Ekartha’s Alice SaaS platform. He is also responsible along with the CEO for managing Ekartha’s SaaS and Cloud outsourced product development business. Prior to that he acted as Interim Vice-President of Product Strategy for Searchmyloan Inc.(www.searchmyloan.com), where he helped guide the company’s product strategy and marketing. He is key evangelist of Cloud Computing and SaaS on Long Island, and is the chairperson of Cloud Computing and SaaS Special Interest Group for Listnet, www.listnet.org. He actively participates in Cloud Computing standard bodies, and is a contributing author to Practical Guide to Cloud Computing, and the Practical Guide to Cloud SLA’s published by the Cloud Standards Customer Council
